comments.raw_text:
In IE9, right-clicking in the titlebar shows both the toolbar context menu items as well as the titlebar's default context menu items, since there isn't any really visible divider between the two.

It'd be nice to have the same in Firefox.

Additionally, if Tabs on Top is enabled, I think any blank space on the tabs toolbar should also display the titlebar's context menu items.
